name: Curious Emotion Collection
description:
The games were made for Coded emotions game jam

Art & Design - Johannes Kristmann

Art & Design - Mascha Camino

Special Thanks to: Wario, mille grazie. 

Game 1:
Curious Wario Ware Game collection.

- Actors and actresses need to get into different emotional states before going on stage and performing for the audience. These small Wario games can help them to feel the right emotions easy peasy. 
- You can currently feel anger, fear, and joy 

Game 2: 
Curious emotional Game Jam depiction 

- All these lovely people participated in the game jam and made some emotional games. 
- While they were working hard, we were working hard on showing how hard they work. 
- See what it was like to participate in the Coded Emotions game jam 

Game 3: 

Curious Potion Emotion 

- This game is just a small addition to the overall collection 
- It is not finished and it will probably never be, but it's loved just as much. <3 
- The mall witch in the woods is supposed to sell potion emotions, but she just doesn't really feel like it. 

The game jam was a great opportunity for us to work on very small games in unused engines to create cute and fun experiences. :)
